listing.agent_address: Stanhope House, 4-8 Highgate High Street, Highgate
listing.description: An exceptional development of two, newly constructed four bedroom luxury houses, conveniently located on a popular street in the heart of Kentish Town. These thoughtfully designed and impressive homes offer bright and well planned accommodation of approximately 2500 sq ft, arranged over four floors and will be finished to a very high standard throughout in a contemporary style. The accommodation will comprise a reception room, kitchen/dining room, guest cloakroom, en-suite principal bedroom, three further bedrooms (one with en-suite shower room) and a family bathroom. Further benefits include a private rear landscaped garden and the comfort of a 10 year NHBC guarantee. Located within easy reach of Kentish Town Underground & Overground stations, close to the amenities of the Kentish Town Road and Fortis Road and within easy reach of Camden Town. Due for completion Summer 2014. N.B. Please note these images are computer generated
listing.short_description: An exceptional development of two, newly constructed four bedroom luxury houses, conveniently located on a popular street in the heart of Kentish Town. (contd...)
listing.displayable_address: Willes Road, Kentish Town, London NW5

listing.description: LocationChester Terrace is a quiet private road, set back from the Outer Circle. The terrace is fronted by a 300 metre communal garden and is served by private residents' security. Regent's Park itself is closed to traffic from midnight to the early hours of the morning.DescriptionComprising 11, 100 square feet/1, 031 square metres, 37 Chester Terrace has outstanding entertainment spaces (including a cards room, library, cinema, spa and wine cellar). The drawing room has six windows across Regent's Park. The house has a separate business entrance directly on to a study and pa area. There is a 50 foot/15.24 metre wide roof garden (with an open air jacuzzi) offering impressive views of Regent's Park, and other iconic London monuments (such as the London Eye and the Shard). The house comes with an internal garage, additional outside parking spaces and a 3 bedroom mews/staff house with garage.
listing.short_description: This exceptional property is one-of-a-kind and has been finished and refurbished using some of the highest quality materials from around the globe.
listing.displayable_address: Chester Terrace, Regent's Park, London NW1
Chester Close North, Regents Park NW1
listing.description: A stunning 1800 sq ft house with stylish decor, modern fixtures and fittings in a sough-after location.The property comprises of three double bedrooms, two bathrooms, modern kitchen, a contemporary reception room and further benefits from a parking space.Perfectly located, this property has the great advantage of allowing one to spend tranquil time in the green open spaces of Regent's Park, or dip into the hustle and bustle which Camden has to offer.For transport, Mornington Crescent (Northern Line) and Euston (Northern, Victoria and National Rail) are within half a mile.
listing.short_description: A stunning 1800 sq ft house with stylish decor, modern fixtures and fittings in a sough-after location. The property comprises of three double bedrooms, two bathrooms, modern kitchen, a contemporary reception room and further benefits from a parking space.

listing.description: A 1, 830 sq ft four bedroom three storey staggered terrace house situated in a private gated Mews development.The owner's love"A fantastic house for entertaining""The space is great with lots of storage, an ideal house for a family""The development is very quiet and private with great neighbours"we've noticedThe property is contemporary with a central glass atrium.The development is set just off Brecknock Road with transport links.
listing.short_description: A 1, 830 sq ft four bedroom three storey staggered terrace house situated in a private gated Mews development.
listing.displayable_address: Brecon Mews, Brecknock Road, Tufnell Park N7

listing.description: Each house provides an abundance of living space and private outside space. Available to buy for the first time, these houses offer the highest specification with privacy and security in mind.Along with a 24 hour concierge and CCTV, the houses also benefit from underground parking and direct access from the car to the house. All houses boast large kitchens, designed decked patio gardens, terracing and an entire floor dedicated to entertaining or relaxation and access to the stunning communal courtyard.
listing.short_description: Regents Courtyard is an exclusive gated development of five contemporary interior designed and fully furnished houses bordering Regents Park and Primrose Hill.

listing.description: LocationCumberland Terrace is located on the eastern side of Regent's Park's outer circle, between St. Katharine's Precinct and Chester Terrace.Regent's Park itself offers a wide range of recreational facilities, including the Zoological Gardens, the open air theatre, Queen Mary's Gardens, the boating lake and tennis courts. The nearest Underground station is Great Portland Street (Circle and Metropolitan Lines), which is approximately 750 metres walk.DescriptionThe property has accommodation spread over five floor floors, providing spacious and elegant entertaining space, as well as having views towards Regent's Park.
listing.short_description: An impressive semi-detached family home, which forms part of this striking Terrace in London's Regent's Park.
listing.displayable_address: Cumberland Terrace, Regent's Park, London NW1

listing.description: LocationRegent’s Park Road is just a quick stroll to Chalk Farm Underground Station (Northern Line), Swiss Cottage & St. John’s Wood Underground Stations, providing connections on the Jubilee Line (Zone 2) to Bond Street (West End), London Bridge (The Shard), Canary Wharf and Stratford (Olympic Village).Description58 Regent's Park Road is a unique house in Primrose Hill. It is the only fully detached family home with a substantial private garden and direct views of Primrose Hill & Regent's Park.This elegant period family house has recently undergone an extensive programme of remodelling and refurbishment and now offers spacious and contemporary family accommodation across c. 6, 000 sq ft. The house retains lots of period charm and benefits from a wonderful outlook over Primrose Hill from the ground floor upwards, and also views towards Regent’s Park from the upper floors.
listing.short_description: A substantial detached Victorian villa with sweeping views of Primrose Hill.
listing.displayable_address: Regents Park Road, Primrose Hill, London NW1

listing.description: LocationSt. Katherine's Orchard can be found on the eastern side of Regent's Park, abutting St. Katherine's Precinct. Regent's Park itself offers a wide range of recreational facilities, including the Zoological Gardens, the open air theatre, Queen Mary's Gardens, the boating lake and tennis courts. The nearest Underground stations are Great Portland Street (Circle and Metropolitan Lines), as well as Camden Town (northern line), both of which are within approximately 1.2km walk.DescriptionThe Carrick Villa is a newly built detached house built in the Nash style of architecture. The house is set behind a shared gated driveway. The house expands to 3, 355 sq ft (311 sq m) of accommodation, and is presented in immaculate condition throughout. The Villa is set in beautiful landscaped gardens and terraces to three sides of the property and presents a rare opportunity to own a newly constructed house in Regent's Park with the added benefit of a double garage, further parking and access from the garden to a passage leading to the Outer Circle.
listing.short_description: This newly built detached house has been built in the Nash style of architecture, and is set behind security gates with a driveway.
listing.displayable_address: St. Katherine's Orchard, 197 Albany Street, Regent's Park, London NW1
